title: Picture books on video. - Volume 2 = Turramulli and the giant Quinkin
creator_credit: Cathy Miller, Catharine Campbell and Video Classroom
brief_description: Three Aboriginal Dreamtime stories. “Turramulli the giant Quinkin” and “Banana Bird and the Snake men” are both written by Percy Trezise, illustrated by Dick Roughsey and narrated by Bob Maza. “The Frog and the pelican” is written by Des O’Brien. The stories are narrated with background music as the illustrations are shown on screen.
